item.description:
This full moon hike is scheduled to take place on Thursday, January 24th.  A snow storm is forecast for Friday night and Saturday, so we will hike on Thursday.  Hopefully, we will the a clear sky that is in the forecast.

 

However, it will be very, very cold on Thursday night with a wind chill factor as low as minus 10 degrees.

 

Therefore, very warm clothing and insulated winter boots are required for this hike.  Hand and toe warmers and a flashlight will be useful as well.

 

We are going to meet at the parking lot of the MA Boat Ramp on Clark Rd. in Plymouth at 6:45pm.  From there we will carpool to the Wildlands Trust parking lot on Gallows Pond Rd.  The Wildlands Trust parking lot is small with limited parking.  A map to the MA Boat Ramp parking lot can be found at this URL:

http://maps.massgis.state.ma.us/dfg/OFBA_GMAP.htm?OFBA_ID=10
item.how_to_find_us: Check the website on Wed., Jan. 23rd

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Wolf Moon Hike
